welcome_message_body: Welcome to Marquette-les-Lille, the charming city known for its rich history and scenic beauty. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free and unlimited access throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminals.
